================

### EP740-222034 Fairness Monitor Services

#### Solicitation Number
WS3731383989

#### Amendment Number
3

#### Tender Closing Date (14:00:00 EST)
14 December 2022

#### Expected Contract Start Date
None (not provided)

#### Expected Contract End Date
None (not provided)

#### Status
Expired (this tender has closed for submissions)

### Description of Requirement

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is seeking the services of Fairness Monitors to observe or monitor departmental procurement activities. The independent assurance provided by Fairness Monitors will help ensure that procurement activities are conducted with integrity, accountability, and transparency.

### Solicitation Information

* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and other relevant agreements
* **Regions of Delivery**: Canada
* **Contact Information**:
	+ **Stefano, Samuel** (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ samuel.stefano@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Notice and Attachments

To access the full notice, please visit [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14507710?extsite=MTQ1MDc3MTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14507710?extsite=MTQ1MDc3MTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
 
No attachments are included with this notice. 
RECTIFICATION DE LA DATE LIMITE DE SOUMISSION: Veuillez ignorer la date limite de soumission compétitive dans la publication de l'Ariba Discovery. Toutefois, les pièces justificatives requises et votre soumission doivent être soumises avant 14h00, le 14 Décember 2022. Aucune soumission faut si elle est déposée après cette date. 

Nous vous remercions des expressions du fait sujet.
